mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.balance AS "balance", a.credit AS "credit", a.debit AS "debit", a.operator AS "operator", a.type AS "type", a.member_no AS "memberNo", a.order_no AS "orderTable.id", a.payment_no AS "orderTablePayment.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deposit( id, balance, credit, debit, operator, type, member_no, order_no, payment_no, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{balance}, #{credit}, #{debit}, #{operator}, #{type}, #{memberNo}, #{orderTable.id}, #{orderTablePayment.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE deposit SET balance = #{balance}, credit = #{credit}, debit = #{debit}, operator = #{operator}, type = #{type}, member_no = #{memberNo}, order_no = #{orderTable.id}, payment_no = #{orderTablePayment.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
from deposit a where a.member_no=#{id} ORDER BY a.create_date desc;
